titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a lytyll treatyse schortely compyled and called ars moriendi that is to saye the craft for to deye for the helthe of mannes sowle.
Ars moriendi. English.
titleStmt.author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, from the original French.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
